taskbody.prereq: Before creating a task topic, you must install oXygen XML Author. You can download a trial version of the oXygen at download

context.p: Once you complete the instructions, you must create a task topic.

step.cmd: Select File New . Alternatively, click the New icon.

choices.choice: Enter taskin the Type filter text text box.
Expand the Framework templates - DITA - Topics tree and selectTask.

step.cmd: Provide a meaningful title in the Title text box.

info.note: Do not insert special characters or exceed the 225 character limit while providing the title.

taskbody.result: You have successfully created a task topic.

example.title: Sample Task Topic (XML code)
example.codeblock: <task id="sqlj"> <title>Creating an SQLJ file</title> <taskbody> <context>Once you have set up SQLJ, you need to create a new SQLJ file.</context> </taskbody> </task>
